page.title: 14HOME LIFE
page.content: I got out of bed and made myself some breakfast. I made myself some cornflakes and then I got dressed into my swimming suit and put my clothes on top. I wore my pink dress and pink shoes and when we went swimming we all went in my Dad's car. My sister had armbands on and she fell in. Then my brother and I got in and I taught him how to catch a beach ball. Then we went to a cafe and my brother wanted to weigh himself so I gave him some money. When I got home I did some washing, then I played with my toys. I had my tea and I had hot-dogs.Then I went to bed. (Fay) When I wake up on Sunday I turn on my light and read. When I hear Daddy go downstairs I have my breakfast then I wash and dress.I play the piano then play outside or go shopping with Mummy.After lunch I help to (cont'd)
